title: League of Legends won't open in Loading Screen in Mac
body: I just started a game 20 minues ago, and the game didn't open, when it's suppose to go into the loading screen, it gave me a black screen. No sounds or any image came through for 2 minutes. It was on PBE so I thought "ok, so maybe it works on the normal NA server"  but then it still didn't work, and it counted me as dodging the game and gave me punishments for that. Someone please help me with it, I can't even play practice tool.

replies.body: These issues and black screen are super common with connection issues struggling to reach our services.  You'll want to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, but test it in custom games to prevent further penalties.

Thank you, I checked my connection, it is fine, I could play a game yesterday, but then not today. Also could it have a connection with my PBE crashing before and say "there's something wrong with your update" and then downloading the new patch again?

Doubtful, the symptoms you have are very common with network related problems.  Have you checked your antivirus or configuring your firewall settings with the HRT?  If the issue persists, grab the logs provided by HRT and attach them to a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a closer look into this with you directly.

I just checked the connection issues, and even used the hextech repair tool, reinstalled the game, repatched, but it doesn't work. I tried the tips in connection issues, and it still didn't work. Is there something wrong with the PBE patch that messed up?
